episodes.title: ADHD, Cult Upbringing, and the Path to Healing!
episodes.description:
Today we welcome back Up4thechallenge as a guest host and Maitre, ADHD friend and cult survivor. Opening up about her life with ADHD and her upbringing in a cult. Her candid discussion provides deep insights into the struggles and triumphs of navigating ADHD within the confines of a restrictive environment. 

📚 What's Inside:
* Growing up with ADHD in a cult.
* The psychological impact of cult life.
* Strategies for managing ADHD.

Lobow’s SPARK has started a fundraising effort for Crisis Text Line. We have a goal of $19 per episode as $19 supports one person in their time of absolute crisis with their mental health. If you would like to donate through our fundraiser in titled “Lauren’s Infinity”, the link is listed below. https://www.classy.org/fundraiser/3638033

💬 Join the Conversation:
Leave a comment below sharing your thoughts, experiences, or any questions you have about living with ADHD, education challenges, or mental health advocacy.

#podcast #mentalhealth #adhd
